attributes.action: Breeders should be required by law to do home checks
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see it be required by law that people wishing to buy or adopt a dog, MUST have a home check.

This is why there are so many dog attacks. It's not the dog, it's the owner.

All dogs have the right to be in a safe and loving environment.

It breaks my heart knowing there are dogs out there not being looked after properly and being beaten by sick people.

If you agree with me, please sign. It's about time this was made the law!
